name: GT Foursquare
author: Global Task

sections.description:
GT Foursquare plugin gives the ability to show a list and/or a Google Map with the latest checkings. It’s fully customizable.

Features
* List view of checkings
* Map view with Google maps.
* Uses JavaScript to avoid KML issues
* Widget display
* Shortcode Feature (multiple shortcodes supported)
* Configuration for display options such as width, height and count of checkins
* Enable/Disable Map
* Enable/Disable List
* Option to set a Custom Marker icon

Tags: FourSquare, Global Task, GlobalTaskSoftware.com, 4SQ, 4Square, Four Square, FourSquare Checkins, Checkins, map checkin, api, shout, social, sociable, google map, google, foursquare map, location, social media, location based, place, vanue, foursquare maps in WIDGET AREA.
sections.installation:
1. Unpack the download-package.
  2. Upload the file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  4. Configure the options under Admin Panel Settings >> GT Foursquare.
  5. Done and Ready.
  6. Please see FAQ for usage.
sections.faq:
How do I add GT Foursquare widget?

  • Go to Appearance -> Widgets -> GT Foursquare and drag it to your desired location.

How do I use the shortcode?

  • You can add [gt4sq] on any content. Additionally you can specify its attributes like this:
    [gt4sq map_enable=”1″ list_enable=”1″ width=”250″ height=”250″ count=”5″]

How do I configure the settings?

  • You can configure the plugin by visiting Settings >> GT Foursquare.

Do you have any question?

  • Please report your questions or bugs at Global Task Contact Page.
